travel.title: Get a Travel Health Insurance Proposal
travel.description: Want to get a Travel Health Insurance proposal for yourself or someone else?
travel.travelSixMonthControl: The travel time of your policy exceeds 6 months. Each time you travel abroad, your guarantee is limited to 6 weeks for touristic or business purposes and 6 months for student travel. Your policy provides guarantee for a total of 184 days of travel per year.
travel.travelIsDepartureDateSameWithToday: Policies purchased today start to provide coverage after 24 hours. In order for your policy to be valid, it must be purchased before exiting TC customs.

trafficCalculator.traficPremiumCalculateDescHTML: The calculated values are the general ranges legally determined according to vehicle classes and location and are provided for information purposes only. We recommend that you ask for an offer for certain premium amounts that apply to your vehicle.
trafficCalculator.traficPremiumCalculateInfoHTML: The calculated premiums are not final premiums and are calculated for general information purposes. Since the final premium amounts vary according to the risk profile, you can learn the exact premium values specific to your vehicle by receiving the Compulsory Traffic Insurance offer.
